changelog:
Added:
– Drag & drop button reordering via dedicated Edit Mode.
– Tooltips enabled by default with toggle option in settings.
– Version number now displayed in the settings panel.
– Automatic update check system for tracking latest version.
– Null object creation now enables Motion Blur and applies Motion Tile with presets.

Changed:
– Major redesign of the Settings panel UI for a cleaner and more intuitive layout.
– All settings now apply instantly.
– Improved positioning of the context menu.
– Minor overall UI design enhancements.

Fixed:
– Bug where the settings panel failed to open.
